text: Once per month, when there's a decent chance of either person not showing up, seems a little sparse: how about once per week, with the expectation that most appointments will be dropped, as this gives over four times more opportunities for it to work?

elements.text: Once per month, when there's a decent chance of either person not showing up, seems a little sparse: how about once per week, with the expectation that most appointments will be dropped, as this gives over four times more opportunities for it to work?

text: Well, the cause of the no-show issue was that a lot of folks joined the community and then left. So there were inactive accounts in that channel, and <@UFQ0XSFH6> seemingly isn't smart enough to ignore inactive accounts. So by removing everyone, we've re-seeded the channel with people who are active. If you'd personally like to have more frequent calls with other people, I think you could just drop some sort of "Hi, I want to meet more people, let's setup some calls, DM me!" in that channel (or even <#C01932BJGE8|present-company>) and I bet other folks would take you up on it.
